desc: Jiu Jitsu, Grappling, and MMA tutorials, coaching and advice.

layout.text:
LET'S SOLVE THEM!
MY NAME IS SHAWN WILLIAMS AND I'VE HELPED THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE COME TO A BETTER UNDERSTANDING OF THE VAST REALM OF JIU JITSU. I BELIEVE THAT LEARNING JIU JITSU CAN BE BOTH EASY AND IMMENSELY FUN...EVEN DURING THOSE PESKY PLATEAUS. I'M CURRENTLY IN THE PROGRESS OF SETTING UP ONLINE LEARNING AND WOULD LOVE TO HELP YOU! PLEASE JOIN MY MAILING LIST BELOW IF YOU'D LIKE NOTIFICATIONS OF WHEN I RELEASE NEW ARTICLES, TUTORIALS, ONLINE LEARNING, AND MUCH MORE. I LOOK FORWARD TO BECOMING PART OF YOUR JOURNEY.
